name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Boil the spaghetti in salted water.
Fry the pancetta until crisp.
Beat the eggs and mix with cheese.
Drain spaghetti and mix with pancetta.
Remove from heat, add egg and cheese mixture, stir quickly.
Season with pepper and serve.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste.
Grill or pan-fry chicken pieces.
Fry onion and spices, add tomatoes.
Add chicken and cream, simmer.
Serve with rice or naan.

name: Sushi Rolls
steps: Cook and season sushi rice.
Lay nori on bamboo mat, spread rice.
Add fillings (salmon, avocado, cucumber).
Roll tightly and slice.
Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

name: Nasi Lemak
steps: Cook rice with coconut milk and pandan leaves.
Prepare sambal by frying chili paste with onions and anchovies.
Arrange rice, sambal, eggs, anchovies, peanuts, and cucumber on a plate.
Serve on banana leaf for authentic presentation.

name: Roti Canai
steps: Mix flour, water, condensed milk, ghee, and salt to form a dough.
Knead until smooth, then let rest for 2 hours.
Divide dough, stretch and fold into thin rounds.
Fry on a hot griddle with oil until golden and crispy.
Serve with dhal or curry.

name: Laksa
steps: Boil fish, flake the flesh, and set aside.
Cook laksa paste in a pot, add coconut milk and bring to simmer.
Add fish, noodles, and toppings (eggs, sprouts, mint, lime).
Serve hot.

name: Satay
ingredients: 500g chicken or beef, cut into cubes
steps: Marinate meat with satay spice and coconut milk for 2 hours.
Thread meat onto skewers.
Grill over charcoal until cooked and slightly charred.
Serve with peanut sauce, cucumber, and onion.
